short_description: guder gmbh hoya is a painting, plastering & wall covering services company based in germany.
long_description: ihr malereibetrieb guder gmbh in 3ter generation fachhandel musterstudio. ihr musterstudio guder gmbh zur inspiration musterstudio. ihr partner in sachen farbe. unser team aus malern und lackierern findet für jeden kundenwunsch die optimale lösung. in unserem fachhandel für heim und gewerbe finden sie alles was das malerherz begehrt. von malerzubehör in jeglicher art und weise bis zu individuell angemischten farben. von der grünpflege, grundstückspflege, gehwegreinigung, gartenservice bis zum hausmeisterservice. wir helfen ihnen nach individuellen wünschen.
generated_description: guder gmbh hoya, legally known as guder gmbh, is a third-generation painting company based in hoya, lower saxony. the company specializes in a wide range of services including interior painting, ecological plastering, flooring, facade work, glazing, and sun protection. they offer both commercial and residential services, providing customized solutions to meet individual customer needs. additionally, guder gmbh operates a pattern studio where customers can explore various colors, patterns, and finishes for inspiration. the company also provides specialized services such as green care, garden services, and housekeeping.
